name: Lost Memories Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 +
  • Graphics: Nvida Geforce 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
